content: I've been thinking about getting an automatic fish feeder to make feeding my fish easier and more convenient. I've been feeding them at the same time every day, 7 pm, and it's become a nice ritual for me to sit and watch them eat. I set up my 10-gallon freshwater tank about three months ago, and I've learned so much about aquarium keeping since then. Do you think an automatic feeder would be a good investment for my tank, or are there any other options I should consider?
